main event: Observers in Sandusky, Ohio reported seeing a yellow-orange speck in the sky that changed color and size as they approached it.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object had a tail similar to that of a jet aircraft,The observers described the object's upper part resembling a shark's body,The report suggests that the sighting may have been due to an exhaust trail or contrail,Insufficient data for conclusive evaluation of the object
witness description: Not specified, but included a couple observing the sighting.
